articles.title: On a night described as a ‘gut punch,’ resilient Red Sox keep on fighting
summary: Resilient Red Sox continue to fight despite setbacks

articles.title: Cannabis Commission head was wrongly terminated, judge says

articles.title: What Red Sox ace Garrett Crochet said after a disastrous outing vs. Cleveland
summary: Garrett Crochet expressed disappointment in not receiving support after giving up a run.

The statement was reported by Boston.com.
